record.title: MOURNING THE PASSING OF PRESIDENT GERALD RUDOLPH FORD
record.chair: The unfinished business is the question of suspending the rules and agreeing to the resolution, H. Res. 15, as amended.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Michigan (Mr. Ehlers) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 15, as amended, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 21, on Motion to Suspend the Rules and Agree, as Amended (H. Res. 15), had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
